title: UPLC-CAPE Metrics Schema
description: Schema for benchmark metrics data in the UPLC-CAPE framework. See doc/metrics.md for comprehensive metric documentation including formulas, protocol parameters, and interpretation guidelines.

version.description: Schema version in semantic versioning format

measurements.description: Aggregated performance measurements from UPLC evaluations

maximum.description: Maximum CPU units across all evaluations

sum.description: Sum of CPU units across all evaluations

minimum.description: Minimum CPU units across all evaluations

median.description: Median CPU units across all evaluations

sum_positive.description: Sum of CPU units from successful evaluations only

sum_negative.description: Sum of CPU units from failed evaluations only

maximum.description: Maximum memory units across all evaluations

sum.description: Sum of memory units across all evaluations

minimum.description: Minimum memory units across all evaluations

median.description: Median memory units across all evaluations

sum_positive.description: Sum of memory units from successful evaluations only

sum_negative.description: Sum of memory units from failed evaluations only

script_size_bytes.description: Size of serialized UPLC script in bytes (constant across evaluations)

term_size.description: Number of AST nodes in the UPLC term (constant across evaluations)

execution_fee_lovelace.description: Execution cost in lovelace (CPU + memory cost only, no reference script fee)

reference_script_fee_lovelace.description: Reference script storage cost in lovelace (Conway era tiered pricing)

total_fee_lovelace.description: Total cost in lovelace (execution + reference script fee)

tx_memory_budget_pct.description: Percentage of transaction memory budget used

tx_cpu_budget_pct.description: Percentage of transaction CPU budget used

block_memory_budget_pct.description: Percentage of block memory budget used

block_cpu_budget_pct.description: Percentage of block CPU budget used

scripts_per_tx.description: Maximum number of script executions that fit in a single transaction

scripts_per_block.description: Maximum number of script executions that fit in a single block

description.description: Description of what this evaluation tests

cpu_units.description: CPU execution units consumed for this evaluation

memory_units.description: Memory units consumed for this evaluation

evaluator.description: Name and version of the evaluator used

timestamp.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when measurements were taken

notes.description: Optional notes about the implementation or measurements
